```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
Tax_Burden_clean <- read_excel("~/Downloads/Tax_Burden_clean.xlsx")
reg2 <- lm(pack_consumption_pc ~ retail_tax_percentage + mean_pp, data = Tax_Burden_clean) 
summary(reg2)

p <- ggplot(data = reg2,
            mapping = aes(x = pack_consumption_pc,
                          y = retail_tax_percentage,
                          color = mean_pp))
p + geom_point() + guides(fill = "none") +
  labs(x = "Pack Consumption Per Capita", y = "Federal and State tax as a Percentage of Retail Price", color = "Average Cost Per Pack")

Tax_Burden_clean$resids=resid(reg2)
plot(Tax_Burden_clean$pack_consumption_pc, Tax_Burden_clean$mean_pp, xlab="Pack Consumption", ylab="Average Cost per pack", main="Pack v.s. Consumption")


Tax_Burden_clean$resids=resid(reg2)
plot(Tax_Burden_clean$pack_consumption_pc, Tax_Burden_clean$retail_tax_percentage, xlab="Pack Consumption", ylab="Average Cost per pack", main="Pack v.s. Consumption")

```
